page.title: 11Playground Games, New Deer
page.content: Some of the games played in the school playground at New Deer are catching games like British Bulldogs, Join the Crew and Steps. Usually the person caught becomes "the man" for the next game. Queeny-Queeny Coco is a ball catching game where one person throws a ball and everyone pretends to have it, calling "Queeny-Queeny Coco who's got the ball?I haven't got it in my pocket. Queeny-Queeny Coco who's got the ball?" The "man" has to guess who has the ball. Some skipping games are;"High, Low, Medium, Slow, Rocky, Dolly, Pepper, Wish", "Cinderella dressed in yellow" and "Cowboy Joe from Mexico". Some skipping games are for one person, some are for two or more and some use two ropes.
